symptom: Overclaimed success on unverified shell script
root_cause: Declared victory on happy path without testing edge cases (JSON injection, overrides)
fix: Always use strong typing/languages for data (Python > Shell) and verify failure modes
prevent: Verify edge cases explicitly before notify_user

symptom: Validation was below standard (Happy Path only)
root_cause: Verified success scenarios but skipped adversarial/edge cases (JSON injection, Logic conflicts)
fix: Verification must include negative tests and failure mode inspection
prevent: Reject Pass results unless accompanied by logs proving Why it passed

symptom: Passive docs (LIAM.md) were ignored; recurrent mistakes persisted.
root_cause: Reliability on human memory/diligence is a failure mode.
fix: Shift from Passive Memory (Docs) to Active Mechanism (Guard)
prevent: Implement runtime checks that block known bad patterns automatically.
